content:
Hi y'all!
I'm Rafaela (she/her), based in Leipzig, Germany. I'm one of the organizers of RustFest and will also be one of the persons handling Asquera Event UG from this year on. I have been invited by @Erin to potentially support All Hands in Greece with managing banking on behalf of Asquera Event.
Excited to be here!
Best regards :blossom:
@Rafaela Welcome, as a clarification it's not that Erin. I'm also Erin, just with a less obvious name. :smiley:
Hah, thanks for clarifying! :laughing: Hey! :wave:
